evidence.source_document: Order Granting Joint Motion for Final Approval of Settlement Agreement
evidence.text:
ORDER GRANTING JOINT MOTION FOR FINAL APPROVAL OF SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT

The Court hereby finds the Settlement Agreement to be fair, reasonable, and adequate, and therefore the settlement of the Motion pursuant to the terms and conditions of the Settlement Agreement is hereby approved.

extracted.value: The Court granted Plaintiffs’ joint motion for final approval of the settlement agreement.
